With SLT Exchange platform, Security against hacks and transparency is assured with the use of data encryption & smart contracts protocols respectively. Inorder to ensure a general acceptability in the adoption of SLT tokens, the Mobile App and wallet is enriched with an easy and efficient interface together with a multi-functional features. You can also earn 5% rewards from your referral link/signup. Yes! more of those passive income are all here for good.  SLT Wallet Will hold Fiat, altcoins and cryptos alike. While the SLT virtual cards will enable the absolute liquidation or payments of cash from assets or services. The speed in execution of transactions and versatility, will promote growth and add value to the tokens, stakeholders and community in general.  Team & Partnership SLT Exchange platform is supported by Polarisdex and Cryptorank. SLT team members are embedded with lots of experience and knowledge required to take this project to an enviable height. Their expertise is displayed in the way they respond to community support services and the dynamic concepts they integret into the platform development.  Conclusion SLT Exchange platform is a reputable decentralised platform that will support the trading and exchange of diverse and quality digital assets. It’s highly efficient in executing swift transactions and provides interoperability amongst blockchains. SLT platform provides security to traded assets, easy liquidity through debit cards and scalablility. Author: SLT
Title: [ANN] SLT: Decentralized market [ICO]
Body: Thank you for your question, we really appreciate questions like this where we can provide better depth of our project. Our advantage is that that we will have share profit with SLT holders are you familiar with BCO ( crypto bridge token) they offer long term staking and share profit with holders without inflation on their own token. For example, holders will get a little bit of all tokens which are traded  on their exchange, not like Kucoin ( KCS) their holders get only KCS token as shared profit)  but BCO do not accept ERC20 tokens.  So we can say that our project is combination of Kucoin in sense of marketing, promotional offers, all tokens ( the most interesting ones) will be accepted + BCO way of sharing profit with holders + mobile wallet (exchanger) where users will be able to cash out trading profits on debit card - at first, members will be able only SLT convert to FIAT on card after some time that wallet will upgraded to multicurrency wallet.  This is one of the way to drive trading volume to our token. Our project is divided in two parts. First one is decentralized exchange  and second one is wallet exchanger. Second part of our project can not be decentralized because of Debit card.  We think that decentralized exchanges need more marketing, attractive designs and of of course functionality. At the moment you can find functionality everywhere but attractive designs like Kucoin or Binance NOT.  Just imagine that Binance or Kucoin are decentralized and share profits with their holders in form that holders gets all tokens from exchange + new tokens are added on weekly or bi-weekly basses sounds brilliant doesn't it, I would trade on that exchange, wouldn't you ?  + users can cash out profita on debit card  Well I do not see project like this, not alive nor in ICO phase. SO we do not have competition  actually, because we do not compete with new technology, we only use what is already functional and making it more attractive to users and providing a better service than competitors.  Of course if we stumble upon some tech problem we will fix it.  Hope we answered your question.

You can find out more about the difference between security and utility tokens here ---> https://medium.com/@bonpay/security-tokens-vs-utility-tokens-1aa7531aabe8  one more example is crypto bridge token and decentralized exchange http://crypto-bridge.com  part of the profit generated from trading fee will be distributed to SLT holders but not like dividends it is more like a informal "staking".

Title: [ANN] SLT: Decentralized market [ICO]
Body: oh yes, because of that issue (transactions speed and high fees) a lots of Crypto enthusiasts coming up with ideas to solve it improve it. So, we all can find plenty projects solving that issue. Have you noticed how market dictates "theme" for projects (ICOs) lets exclude scams like one ICO wrote penis on their website when they raised millions  At the moment, HOT ISSUES are transactions and fees,mass shopping adotpion, customer protection ( most of the crypto currencies have anonymous transactions so this is huge) if some projects could pull of buyers protections like PayPal had but keeping anonymous part, is going to be huge. I think that UTK ( Utrust) is really close to do that.  Hot issue is centralized exchanges as well, because thaey keep your funds on their wallets, so they can scam you anytime they want there is no law who can protect you, well there is some laws but forget about those because crypto word is not accepted buy all ountries on the world, so it is "wild west". And the best answer on that is decentralized exchanges - find out more about decantralized exchanges here https://www.cryptocompare.com/exchanges/guides/what-is-a-decentralized-exchange/  So we saw high demand for decantralized exchange and we started our project + we added a prepaid card on it ( members will not be able withdraw huge amounts of fiat on that card  because limits quite low on them per day 1000$ or so, some of them have limits 2000$ and someof them have 500$ per day) + mobile wallet for SLT token adn with time that is goint to be multicurrency wallet.  Because we are underdevelopment, we constantly changing (updeting) our white paper - you can expect in May updated white paper with more detailed informations, same is with road map. We follow market and we adjust to new rules from goverments and demand from traders.  If you have any questions, we would be delaghted to answer them

Body: Can you tell more about decentralized exchange concept. Are you thinking about something similar to Etherdelta so based on ethereum smart contacts (but this is limited to ERC20 tokens only) or how can an exchange be decentralized?

Author: SLT
Title: [ANN] SLT: Decentralized market [ICO]
Body: We are thinking  about something  more similar to Bitsquare (bisq.network). And answer to your question - how exchange can truly be decentralized ? - is P2P or peer to peer network. That means that every user holds private keys and exchange is paid like every other exchange - fees on trades.  You can read more here about decentralized exchanges and how p2p concept works  https://www.cryptocompare.com/exchanges/guides/what-is-a-decentralized-exchange/  Any other questions, we would be delighted to answer them
